      • getLastLocation

        public BRTLocalPoint getLastLocation()
        Get last known location
        This Function is suitable for walking positioning.
        获取最近一次的位置信息
        返回:
        last known location
        位置点，该值适用于步行状态下定位。

      • getLastImmediateLocation

        public BRTLocalPoint getLastImmediateLocation()
        Get last known immediate location
        This Function is suitable for non-walking positioning.
        获取最近一次的立即位置
        返回:
        last known immediate location 位置点，该值适用于非步行状态下定位。

      • setLimitBeaconNumber

        public void setLimitBeaconNumber(boolean limitBeaconNumber)
        Set whether to limit the number of beacons used for positioning
        设置是否限制定位使用的beacon个数
        参数:
        limitBeaconNumber - 是否限制，默认false

      • setMaxBeaconNumberForProcessing

        public void setMaxBeaconNumberForProcessing(int maxBeaconNumberForProcessing)
        Set the maximum number of beacons required to participate in location calculation. Default: 9
        设置用于定位的beacon最大个数
        参数:
        maxBeaconNumberForProcessing - 用于定位的beacon最大个数，即选取不多于mbn个beacon进行定位，默认9个

      • setRssiThreshold

        public void setRssiThreshold(int threshold)
        set Minimum Signal Threshold
        设置beacon信号阈值
        参数:
        threshold - Beacon below this signal threshold will be ignored. Default: -90(dBm)
        低于此信号阈值将忽略beacon信号，默认-90dBm

      • setRequestTimeOut

        public void setRequestTimeOut(double rt)
        Setting location request timeout. default: 4(seconds);
        设置定位请求超时时间，即超过此时间没有结果返回定位失败
        参数:
        rt - timeout value. default: 4 (seconds)
        超时时间，默认4s
